info.title: EWMS - Workflow Management Service
info.description: The external interface for starting, tracking, and retrieving results from tasks within EWMS

projection.description: the fields to include in the response

taskforce_uuid.description: the uuid of the updated taskforce object

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: the id of the task directive

task_directives.description: a list of task directive objects

200.description: the uuid of the updated taskforce objects
the next taskforce to start at the condor location
the next taskforce to stop at the condor location
the uuid of the updated taskforce objects

condor_complete_ts.description: the time that the taskforce's condor cluster was ended/terminated/aborted

200.description: the uuid of the updated taskforce objects

top_task_errors_by_taskforce.description: the top errors (paired with a count) for each indicated taskforce

compound_statuses_by_taskforce.description: the compound statuses (status -> state -> count) for the indicated taskforces

200.description: individual results for the updates per uuid

207.description: individual results for the updates per uuid, with errors
